## Checklist

<!-- Verify you've completed these items before submitting -->

- [ ] My code follows the project's architecture patterns (see `.github/copilot-instructions.md`)
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
